title: Ticket #877: NumSystemHolds not incremented when schedd holds scheduler univ jobs
description:
When a scheduler universe job's executable doesn't exist, the schedd puts the job on hold, but doesn't increment NumSystemHolds in the job ad. If the job has a PeriodicRelease referencing NumSystemHolds, it doesn't behave as expected.

For example, the PeriodicRelease expression for condor_dagman is (NumSystemHolds <= 3). If the condor_dagman executable isn't present (say because the admin moved the Condor release dir as part of an upgrade), the dagman job will go into an infinite hold/release cycle.
